definition: surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
to promise/to undertake to do something/commitment
to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
to inherit/to succeed to (the throne etc)/to carry on (a tradition etc)
to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
to underwrite (i.e. guarantee financing)/underwriting/to sell as agent/consignee
to take orders/to receive commands/to carry on (a tradition)

sentences.english: Young heirs to future-hold, city grows more radiant.
sentences.chinese: 青年累代承未來，城市連年添華彩。

sentences.english: Would like to see the grandmother glad to dry, but afraid to father confessed.
sentences.chinese: 承樂見了幹祖母很高興，但怕向父親交代。

sentences.english: Ad valorem stamp duty is payable by the transferee(s) if this form is completed.
sentences.chinese: 如已填妥本表格，承讓人須繳付從價印花稅。

sentences.english: Simply supported reinforced concrete bridges spanning the spillways all came off their bearings.
sentences.chinese: 由泄水壩支撐的橫跨水泥公路完全脫離了它的承載體。

sentences.english: I have just received your letter telling me your recent marriage.
sentences.chinese: 頃接來函，承你告我近日結婚。

sentences.english: We refuse to partake in the production of illusive advertisements.
sentences.chinese: 本公司拒絕承做虛假廣告。

sentences.english: The factory also plans to undertake non-standard business.
sentences.chinese: 本廠同時承接來圖非標業務。

sentences.english: The transferee should consult the Licensing Authority if in doubt.
sentences.chinese: 承讓人如有任何疑問，應向牌照事務監督查詢。

sentences.english: Are risks allocated fairly between Contractor and Employer?
sentences.chinese: 業主與承商間之風險分配是否公平？

sentences.english: Once he said for the click is personally crushed.
sentences.chinese: 曾經自己說過的承偌，卻是自己親手拍碎的。

sentences.english: How are we going to pass the authentic BJ spirit one generation after another to the children?
sentences.chinese: 如何將那種正宗的北京精華一代代承轉下去呢？

sentences.english: Undertake not what you cannot perform, but be careful to keep your promise.
sentences.chinese: 不要承你完成不了的事情，但一定要信守諾言。

sentences.english: Hong Kong stamp duty is payable by the transferee(s) if this form is completed.
sentences.chinese: 填妥此表格後，承讓人須繳付香港印花稅。

sentences.english: The Universal Socket Weld check valve is designed for use in applications where weld joints are required.
sentences.chinese: 通用承插焊止回閥是爲要求焊接的應用場合而設計的。

sentences.english: The manufacture of belts and buckles is put out to subcontractor.
sentences.chinese: 成帶和帶扣的生產，交分包商承做。

sentences.english: Products bearing only service of the material.
sentences.chinese: 產品只是服務的物質承載體。

definition: Qi son of Yu the Great 禹[Yu3], reported founder of the Xia Dynasty 夏朝[Xia4 Chao2] (c. 2070-c. 1600 BC)
to open/to start/to initiate/to enlighten or awaken/to state/to inform
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
adoption (e.g. of a nephew as a son)/to inherit
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
